articles.title: Special Envoy of Kim Jong Un Meets with President of Nicaragua
articles.content:
Special Envoy of Kim Jong Un Meets with President of Nicaragua
 Pyongyang, January 14 (KCNA) -- Choe Ryong Hae, vice-chairman of the State Affairs Commission of the Democratic People's Republic of Korea, met with Daniel Ortega Saavedra, president Nicaragua, on Jan. 10. Choe attended the inaugural ceremony of the Nicaraguan president as a special envoy of Kim Jong Un, chairman of the State Affairs Commission of the DPRK.
					 Choe conveyed the warm greetings of Kim Jong Un to Daniel Ortega Saavedra.
					
					 The president expressed deep thanks and asked Choe to convey his heartfelt greetings to HE Kim Jong Un.
					
					 He affirmed that it is the invariable stand of the government and people of Nicaragua to value and steadily develop the historical relations of friendship between the two countries, saying it is an expression of solidarity for Nicaragua that Kim Jong Un sent his special envoy to the inaugural ceremony.
					
					 He wished the Korean people only victory in their struggle for achieving the country's prosperity under the leadership of Kim Jong Un.

articles.title: Kim Jong Un's Special Envoy Meets Presidents of Venezuela, Bolivia and First Vice-President of Council of State of Cuba
articles.content:
Kim Jong Un's Special Envoy Meets Presidents of Venezuela, Bolivia and First Vice-President of Council of State of Cuba
 Pyongyang, January 14 (KCNA) -- Choe Ryong Hae, vice-chairman of the State Affairs Commission of the DPRK, who is a special envoy of Kim Jong Un, chairman of the State Affairs Commission of the DPRK, on Jan. 10 respectively met with Nicolas Maduro Moros, president of Bolivarian Republic of Venezuela, Evo Morales Aima, president of the Plurinational State of Bolivia, and Miguel Mario Diaz Canel Bermudez, first vice-president of the Council of State of Cuba who attended the inaugural ceremony of the Nicaraguan president.
					 Choe conveyed Kim Jong Un's greetings to the presidents and Raul Castro Ruz, president of the Council of State of Cuba.
					
					 The presidents of Venezuela and Bolivia and the first vice-president of the Council of State of Cuba expressed deep thanks and asked Choe to convey their sincere wishes and the ones of the president of the Council of State of Cuba to Kim Jong Un.
					
					 The Venezuelan president said that his country would thwart the U.S. ever more undisguised schemes with concerted efforts, dynamically advance along the road of socialism and always stand by the DPRK in the struggle for socialism against imperialism.
					
					 The Bolivian president said that he admires the party, government and people of the DPRK standing against imperialism and that his country will overcome difficulties in solidarity with the world progressive people.
					
					 The first vice-president of the Council of State of Cuba said that the invincible ties of friendship provided by the preceding leaders of the two countries will develop into true comradely ones forever, wishing Kim Jong Un good health and greater success in his responsible work for leading the struggle of the Korean people for the prosperity of the country in the new year, too.

articles.title: Kim Jong Un's Special Envoy Leaves Managua
articles.content:
Kim Jong Un's Special Envoy Leaves Managua
 Pyongyang, January 14 (KCNA) -- Choe Ryong Hae, vice-chairman of the State Affairs Commission of the DPRK, who is a special envoy of Kim Jong Un, chairman of the State Affairs Commission of the DPRK, left Managua on Jan. 12 after taking part in the inaugural ceremony of the Nicaraguan president.
					 He was seen off at an airport by the director of Protocol Department of the Presidency of Nicaragua and the Nicaraguan ambassador to Cuba.
					
					 During his stay in Nicaragua he looked round Managua and Granada cities.

articles.title: Choe Ryong Hae Meets Cuban Vice-President of Council of State
articles.content:
Choe Ryong Hae Meets Cuban Vice-President of Council of State
 Pyongyang, January 14 (KCNA) -- Choe Ryong Hae, vice-chairman of the State Affairs Commission of the DPRK, on January 12 met Salvador Antonio Valdes Mesa, vice-president of the Council of State of Cuba, at the building of the Council of State when he made a stopover in Cuba on his return trip after taking part in the inaugural ceremony of the Nicaraguan president as special envoy of Kim Jong Un, chairman of the State Affairs Commission of the DPRK. 
					 Choe Ryong Hae noted that the army and people of the DPRK have and achieved successes in the general offensive for implementing the decision of the Seventh Congress of the Workers' Party of Korea with great pride and honor of holding Kim Jong Un as chairman of the WPK in high esteem. 
					
					 He expressed the stand of the WPK and the DPRK government to invariably boost the bilateral relations with Cuba.
					
					 The Cuban vice-president said that respected Supreme Leader Kim Jong Un is wisely leading the Korean people in the efforts to build a socialist power with his distinguished leadership ability by creditably carrying forward the cause of the great leaders.
					
					 He said that it is an expression of moral sense of revolutionary obligation that Kim Jong Un visited the Cuban Embassy in Pyongyang to mourn the demise of Fidel Castro Ruz and sent a party and state delegation to Cuba.
					
					 Cuba resolutely opposes all the "resolutions" against the DPRK faked up by the hostile forces in the UN, he said, expressing the support for the struggle of the Korean people for accomplishing the cause of national reunification.

articles.title: Libyan PM Hopes for Stronger Relations with DPRK
articles.content:
Libyan PM Hopes for Stronger Relations with DPRK
 Pyongyang, January 14 (KCNA) -- Ju Jin Hyok, DPRK ambassador to Libya, presented his credentials to Fayez al-Serraj, prime minister of the National Unity Government of Libya, on Jan. 10.
					 At the meeting the prime minister said that he was grateful to the friendly DPRK for sincerely helping and supporting the Libyan people.
					
					 He hoped to see success in developing the bilateral relations at present when Libya has embarked upon a fresh historic stage and wished the DPRK greater prosperity.

articles.title: Greetings to Kim Jong Un from Iranian President
articles.content:
Greetings to Kim Jong Un from Iranian President
 Pyongyang, January 14 (KCNA) -- Kim Jong Un, chairman of the Workers' Party of Korea, received a message of greetings from Hassan Rouhani, president of Iran, on Dec. 29 last year.
					 The Iranian president in his message said he was pleased to congratulate Kim Jong Un and the government and people of the DPRK on the occasion of the New Year.
					
					 He hoped that the peace and stability of the world would be ensured and a large number of people would live free from dictatorship, corruption and terrorism in the new year.
					
					 Hoping that the new year would be filled with blessings and happiness, he wished Kim Jong Un good health and success in his work and the people of the DPRK prosperity and happiness.

articles.title: Workers' Hostel at Pyongyang Kim Jong Suk Silk Mill Inaugurated
articles.content:
Workers' Hostel at Pyongyang Kim Jong Suk Silk Mill Inaugurated
 Pyongyang, January 14 (KCNA) -- The workers' hostel of the Pyongyang Kim Jong Suk Silk Mill has been built on the picturesque bank of the Taedong River.
					 The seven-storied building has bedrooms, dining hall, dining room for birthday party, gym and entertainment hall and other facilities.
					
					 Its inauguration ceremony took place on Friday.
					
					 An Jong Su, department director of the C.C., Workers' Party of Korea, made an address there.
					
					 He recalled that respected Supreme Leader Kim Jong Un highly appreciated the work style of the workers of the silk mill honored to become a model unit during the 200-day campaign of loyalty and took a benevolent measure for building a new modern hostel for them.
					
					 He called on the officials and employees of the mill to add luster to the immortal leadership exploits the peerlessly great persons performed for the mill and remain faithful to the idea and leadership of Kim Jong Un.
					
					 That day inmates moved into the hostel amidst blessings of the people.

articles.title: Reception Given for Hostellers of Pyongyang Kim Jong Suk Silk Mill
articles.content:
Reception Given for Hostellers of Pyongyang Kim Jong Suk Silk Mill
 Pyongyang, January 14 (KCNA) -- A reception was given in honor of the inmates at the Workers' Hostel of Pyongyang Kim Jong Suk Silk Mill on Friday.
					 Present there on invitation were labor innovators and hostellers of the mill.
					
					 An Jong Su, department director of the Workers' Party of Korea Central Committee, made a speech.
					
					 He said that the reception, provided by respected Supreme Leader Kim Jong Un, reflects his boundless trust in and love for the working class.
					
					 He called upon all the officials and employees of the mill to always remember the honor of today and repay the benevolence of Kim Jong Un with loyalty.

articles.title: Prestigious Sports Team of DPRK
articles.content:
Prestigious Sports Team of DPRK
 Pyongyang, January 14 (KCNA) -- The Kigwancha Sports Team in the DPRK is taking the lead in the drive for building a sports power.
					 The team, founded in January, Juche 45 (1956), is a prestigious one contributing to the country's sports development.
					
					 The team played a vanguard role in the sports sector in the 70-day campaign and the 200-day campaign last year under the banner of the self-development-first principle.    
					
					 Players Rim Jong Sim and Choe Hyo Sim bagged gold and silver medals in the 31st Olympic Games, Rim Un Sim three gold medals in the 2016 World Junior Weightlifting Championships and rhythmic gymnastic players one silver and four bronze medals in international games.   
					
					 The team snatched more than 300 medals, including 90 gold medals, in the four major national games.
					
					 Now, coaches and players of the team put spurs to training with the enthusiasm to create legendary stories of heroic Korea, in hearty response to the New Year Address made by respected Supreme Leader Kim Jong Un.

articles.title: Agricultural Scientists Focus Efforts on Attaining Main Target
articles.content:
Agricultural Scientists Focus Efforts on Attaining Main Target
 Pyongyang, January 14 (KCNA) -- Respected Supreme Leader Kim Jong Un said in his New Year Address that the agricultural front, the major thrust in building an economic giant, should raise a strong wind of scientific farming.
					 In hearty response to his New Year Address, scientists of the Academy of Agricultural Science in the DPRK are putting spurs to attaining the main target of scientific research from the outset of the year.
					
					 The academy has introduced high-yielding strains of paddy rice and maize whose advantages have already been proved in practice into farms on a large scale and strived to realize the scientific farming methods, including the technologies for cultivating big rice seedlings and sparse planting culture.
					
					 It concentrates its efforts on breeding high-yielding strain resistant to high temperature, drought, cold-weather damage and harmful insects and pushes ahead with a research for providing a foundation of developing detail agricultural technique.
					
					 Big efforts have also been directed to realizing the local production of fertilizers, insecticides and germicides, indispensable for making nutritive liquid for potato.
					
					 The academy accelerates the research into introducing the cultivation technique for guaranteeing the production of more than 50 tons of apples per hectare into the fruit farms across the country.
					
					 It also channel efforts into solving sci-tech problems arising in establishing the process system capable of producing colloidal seed-covering materials, multi-nutrients for rice seedbeds and bio-insecticides in industrial way.

articles.title: Scientists, Technicians Make Efforts to Break through Cutting Edge
articles.content:
Scientists, Technicians Make Efforts to Break through Cutting Edge
 Pyongyang, January 14 (KCNA) -- In hearty response to the New Year Address of respected Supreme Leader Kim Jong Un, scientists and technicians of the State Academy of Sciences of the DPRK are launching a dynamic drive of breaking through the cutting edge in order to open a shortcut for implementing the five-year strategy for national economic development.
					 Taking the lead in this drive are the Mechanical Engineering Institute and Institute of IT Science and Technology, which had the honor of being the model units in the 70-day campaign and the 200-day campaigns last year.
					
					 The scientists and technicians of the institutes are concentrate their efforts on solving the sci-tech problems arising in modernization and normal production at industrial establishments with the main emphasis on the local production of raw materials, fuel and equipment.
					
					 Setting valuable researches conducive to promoting economic development and improving the people's living standard, all institutes under the academy are pushing ahead with researches.

articles.title: Rodong Sinmun Calls for Shining Victory in Building Powerful Socialist Country
articles.content:
Rodong Sinmun Calls for Shining Victory in Building Powerful Socialist Country
 Pyongyang, January 14 (KCNA) -- Rodong Sinmun Saturday in an editorial calls upon all the people of the DPRK to achieve shining victory in building a powerful socialist country with the might of self-reliance and self-development, full of faith in sure victory and optimism. 
					 Self-reliance and self-development serve as eternal viability of Juche Korea and inexhaustible strength for achieving prosperity, it says, adding:
					
					 The history of the Korean revolution is a sacred history in which it started, advanced and emerged victorious by the force of self-development. 
					
					 The revolutionary spirit of self-reliance and fortitude was created in producing Yongil bomb in the forest of Mt. Paektu. This developed into the Kunja-ri revolutionary spirit and the Chollima spirit in the 1950s and proved to be tremendous strength for waging a great struggle and bringing about changes in the annals of the revolution. 
					
					 President Kim Il Sung and leader Kim Jong Il clearly proved, through the gigantic revolutionary practice, the truth that independence is justice of the history and victory of the revolution and created and glorified the tradition of victory with the might of self-reliance and self-development, guided by the independent revolutionary idea.
					
					 Under such grim situation in which high-handed and arbitrary practices of the imperialists and hegemonic forces were rampant, the great leaders had advanced Korean-style socialism with their iron will for decades, stunning the world.
					
					 Last year the army and people of the DPRK brought about the events to be specially recorded in the history of the nation and such miraculous victory as turning adversity into favorable situation startling the world through their day-and-night advance. This is attributable to the indomitable attacking revolutionary idea and the spirit of self-reliance and self-development of respected Supreme Leader Kim Jong Un. 
					
					 Huge are the tasks facing us and difficulties and trials lie in our way. But we can successfully attain the goals of the five-year strategy when we advance with the self-reliance and self-development as the dynamic force and the might of science and technology.

articles.title: Minju Joson Urges U.S. to Have Fresh Way of Thinking
articles.content:
Minju Joson Urges U.S. to Have Fresh Way of Thinking 
 Pyongyang, January 14 (KCNA) -- Obama's gentries are making much fuss, taken aback by the fact that the DPRK entered the final stage of preparation for the test launch of intercontinental ballistic missile.
					 The U.S. deputy secretary of State, blustered that the DPRK's threat has reached an alarming phase and sanctions and pressure upon it would go on no matter what administration emerges in the U.S. Meanwhile, some "experts" and conservative media are busy beating the worn-out drums for "sanctions."
					
					 Commenting on this, Minju Joson Saturday says that the outgoing  Obama group's disgraceful behavior only invites sneers from all people as they are not away from their outdated and anachronistic conception of confrontation.
					
					 What the Obama group uttered is ridiculous, indeed.
					
					 The DPRK's development of ICBM is a part of the measures for bolstering up its self-defensive military capability to cope with the U.S. daily-increasing nuclear war threat. To develop ICBM for defending the country's sovereignty and dignity and people's security can neither run counter to international law nor can be blamed as it is the exercise of the legitimate and independent right of the DPRK.
					
					 The DPRK will continue to bolster up its military capability for self-defense and preemptive strike with the nuclear force as its pivot as long as the U.S. and its vassal forces' nuclear threat and blackmail persist and they stage ceaseless war exercises at its doorstep under the signboard of annual ones.
					
					 Now is the time for the U.S. to respond to the DPRK with a fresh way of thinking.
					
					 The U.S. should make a bold decision of rolling back its anachronistic hostile policy toward the DPRK if it does not want to see the escalating tension.

articles.title: Rodong Sinmun Blasts S. Korean Puppet Group for Its Anti-DPRK Nuclear Racket
articles.content:
Rodong Sinmun Blasts S. Korean Puppet Group for Its Anti-DPRK Nuclear Racket
 Pyongyang, January 14 (KCNA) -- Rodong Sinmun in an article accuses the south Korean puppet group of kicking up an anti-DPRK nuclear racket from the outset of the year while blatantly challenging the nation's desire for reunification.
					 Traitor Hwang Kyo An, puppet prime minister of south Korea, told at so-called opening ceremony of government offices for the year that south Korea would "cope with the north's nuclear threat by bolstering up the security force and closely cooperating with the world community." 
					
					 And the puppet ministry of Unification set it as its plan for this year to regard the "north's denuclearization" as a precondition for dialogue. In the meantime, the military warmongers are making noisy war drum beats, crying out for "defusing the nuclear threat from the north."
					
					 The above-said anti-DPRK nuclear racket is a dangerous provocation to justify the military confrontation with the fellow countrymen in the north and ignite a nuclear war against the DPRK under the pretext of "nuclear threat from the north", the article says, and goes on:
					
					 What should not be overlooked is that the puppet forces are putting spurs to the organization of a special unit in a bid to remove "nuclear threat from the north".
					
					 Their military provocations are further escalating tension on the Korean Peninsula and increasing the danger of a nuclear war.
					
					 At a time when all compatriots at home and abroad dynamically turn out in the advance for reunification with the single desire to pave a broad avenue to independent reunification this year, the puppet forces seek to freeze the north-south relations by kicking up the anti-DPRK nuclear racket in collusion with outsiders and harass peace and security on the Korean Peninsula. Such reckless acts can never be tolerated.
					
					 All compatriots in the north and the south and abroad should intensify a nationwide struggle to make a clean sweep of the south Korean sycophantic traitors getting hell-bent on the anti-DPRK nuclear racket, utterly indifferent to the destiny of the nation.

articles.title: Rodong Sinmun Slams S. Korean Puppet Group's Mendicant Diplomacy
articles.content:
Rodong Sinmun Slams S. Korean Puppet Group's Mendicant Diplomacy
 Pyongyang, January 14 (KCNA) -- South Korean puppet authorities are flying to the U.S. one on the heels of the other to conduct diplomacy for eliciting cooperation in their anti-DPRK racket. This is no more than wicked sycophancy and treachery to escalate the confrontation with the DPRK to the last while kowtowing to the U.S., the sworn enemy of the nation, not heeding the magnanimous call of compatriots, says Rodong Sinmun Saturday in a commentary. 
					 It goes on:
					
					 The south Korean puppet regime is a cursed group of traitors seeking a way out in the confrontation with the north while regarding the U.S. more important than the compatriots in the north, as it is so wicked as to be unable to discern who is the principal enemy of the nation. 
					
					 Great irony is that the above-said mendicant diplomacy kicked off by the puppet authorities is aimed to curry favor with the new master of the White House and garner support from him.
					
					 It is the sinister intention of the puppet group to maintain the conservative regime shaking to its very foundation and realize its ambition to stifle the DPRK by clinging to the coattail of the American master more tightly.
					
					 But, this is a serious miscalculation. The puppet conservative group met the present disaster owing to the anachronistic diplomacy centered on the U.S. This being a hard reality, they are still persisting in their policy of submitting to the U.S., failing to come to senses. Such diplomacy will only precipitate their self-destruction.
					
					 The puppet group's persistent confrontation with the DPRK under the patronage of the U.S. would get them nowhere. For this they will face only the curses and denunciations by all Koreans and final doom.

articles.title: KCNA Commentary Stresses Need to Have Proper Understanding of DPRK
articles.content:
KCNA Commentary Stresses Need to Have Proper Understanding of DPRK
 Pyongyang, January 14 (KCNA) -- A sign of acute China-U.S. confrontation is clearly seen in the run-up to Trump's presidential inauguration. And there is awkward rumor afloat in the world that China would use "north Korea" as a playing card in its confrontation with the U.S. in the future.
					 The Wall Street Journal and American Interest of the U.S. and the Financial Times of Britain and many other media of the world are carrying articles to the effect that there is increasing possibility for the DPRK and China to jointly counter the Trump administration.
					
					 A keynote of those articles is that conflict and confrontation between China and the U.S. would have an impact on the situation on the Korean peninsula and that it seems it would be impossible to rule out a switchover in China's DPRK policy including its acknowledgement of the DPRK's access to nukes.
					
					 This can not be construed otherwise than a unilateral viewpoint of media ignorant of the universal principle concerning the sovereignty of countries and the true picture of the DPRK.
					
					 Explicitly speaking, it is illogical to say that the DPRK can be used as a "playing card" of others as the country is demonstrating its might as a political and ideological power and a nuclear power.
					
					 One has to face up to the reality of the DPRK clearly and squarely, if one wants to know about it.
					
					 The hotspot in which the interests of big powers are intertwined and the issues of international nature have historically accumulated is the Northeast Asian region centered on the Korean peninsula.
					
					 Historically, the tense situation on the Korean peninsula and the war atmosphere fanned up on it have been attributable to the U.S. and other hegemonic forces' diplomatic and political purposes and the Korean nation has been the biggest victim of the tension on the peninsula.
					
					 If the DPRK had not bolstered up and defended its sovereignty, it would have already faced the miserable fate of modern day slaves in the 21st century, not just ending in the "color revolution" and Mideast situation.
					
					 Today the sovereignty of countries and nations is wantonly violated in different parts of the world due to the hegemonic forces' high-handed and arbitrary practices and appeasement, and the U.S. and its vassal forces' sanctions and blockade against the DPRK have reached the extremes. Even under such situation the DPRK towered as a nuclear power and a military power in the East no formidable enemies can dare to provoke.
					
					 The DPRK is not an entity sandwiched between neighboring powers. For its treasured nuclear sword of justice it has emerged a powerful force that can spearhead the regional situation as a strategic stronghold in which the vital interests of big powers are intertwined.
					
					 A new dynamic structure has been set up with the DPRK as an absolute parameter.
					
					 Nothing can bring down the position of the DPRK that has ranked itself with dignity among the nuclear powers with a firm hold on the treasured nuclear sword of justice in order to defend the sovereignty of the nation and its rights to existence and development and safeguard the regional peace and stability. It remains strong regardless of someone's recognition.
					
					 Now is the time for the DPRK to steer the solution of the issue of peace and stability in Northeast Asia as it has undergone a fundamental change in its strategic position.
					
					 The DPRK will as ever safeguard its peace and security by its own strength and make a positive contribution to defending the world peace and stability.

articles.title: GIs' Drug Smuggling Disclosed in S. Korea
articles.content:
GIs' Drug Smuggling Disclosed in S. Korea 
 Pyongyang, January 14 (KCNA) -- Drug smuggling by  service members belonging to the 2nd division of the U.S. imperialist aggressor forces in south Korea was disclosed, according to the south Korean Yonhap News on January 10.
					They were detected while smuggling from California narcotic enough for 130,000 persons to use at a time through military mail.

articles.title: S. Korean Media Terms Ban Ki-moon Faithful Servant of U.S.
articles.content:
S. Korean Media Terms Ban Ki-moon Faithful Servant of U.S.
 Pyongyang, January 14 (KCNA) -- An article contributed by a writer dealing with the crimes of Ban Ki-moon was posted on a south Korean online paper on Jan. 8. 
					 Ban Ki-moon, highly sensitive to promotion and social ambition, took the office of the UN secretary general with the support of former president Roh Moo Hyun of south Korea, the article noted, disclosing the crimes he committed in the subsequent period.
					
					 It said:
					
					 It was estimated in the UN that he had just played the role of a faithful servant of the U.S.
					
					 In the last decade during which he worked as UN secretary general, the inter-Korean relations sank rock bottom.
					
					 Lee Myung Bak and Park Geun Hye regimes cut off all channels of dialogue between the north and the south. In the period Ban did nothing in this regard. He danced to the tunes of the "policy toward the north" pursued by Lee and Park regimes.

articles.title: Kim Jong Un's Work Published in Russia
articles.content:
Kim Jong Un's Work Published in Russia
 Pyongyang, January 14 (KCNA) -- Rosiski Pisateli Publishing House of Russia brought out in pamphlet "Making Selfless, Devoted Efforts for the Good of the People Is the Mode of Existence and Source of Invincible Might of the Workers' Party of Korea", a work of Supreme Leader Kim Jong Un of the Democratic People's Republic of Korea.
					 The work, published on October 10, Juche 104 (2015), says that the history of the Workers' Party of Korea is a proud course in which it has led the Korean revolution to victory, being responsible for the people's destiny under the guidance of President Kim Il Sung and leader Kim Jong Il.
					
					 A book releasing ceremony took place at the publishing house on January 6.

articles.title: Kim Jong Un's Exploits Lauded by Foreign Media
articles.content:
Kim Jong Un's Exploits Lauded by Foreign Media
 Pyongyang, January 14 (KCNA) -- Media of different countries gave special write-ups to the 5th anniversary of respected Supreme Leader Kim Jong Un's assumption of supreme commandership of the Korean People's Army (KPA) from Dec. 14 to 30 last year.
					 The Russian newspaper Rio Panorama allotted one whole page to an article titled "The proud country" telling about the fact that Kim Jong Un has wisely led the struggle for global independence.
					
					 Russia's online magazine Lemchich and Syria's newspaper Al Baath edited articles titled "Comrade Kim Jong Un, supreme commander of the Korean People's Army", "The DPRK celebrates the 5th anniversary of HE Kim Jong Un's assumption of KPA supreme commandership" to praise his Songun leadership feats.
					
					 The Venezuelan newspaper Vea and the website of the Juche Idea Study Group of Basque Country of Spain introduced world social circles' reverence for Supreme Leader Kim Jong Un in the articles titled "Kim Jong Un, leader of the DPRK who jolts the world" and "Characteristics of Kim Jong Un's politics".
					
					 The Cambodian State Radio praised Marshal Kim Jong Un for making ceaseless journey of Songun to bolster up the military capabilities of the DPRK.

articles.title: Enviado especial de Kim Jong Un se reune con el Presidente nicaraguens
articles.content:
s011403 - Enviado especial de Kim Jong Un se reune con el Presidente nicaraguense
Pyongyang, 14 de enero (ACNC) -- El vicepresidente del Comite de Estado de la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea, Choe Ryong Hae, quien participo en ceremonia de toma de posesion del Presidente de la Republica de Nicaragua en calidad de enviado especial del Maximo Dirigente Kim Jong Un, Presidente del Comite de Estado de la RPDC, se reunio el dia 10 con el mandatario centroamericano Daniel Ortega Saavedra. 
					En la ocasion, el visitante transmitio el saludo cordial que envia Kim Jong Un a Daniel Ortega Saavedra. 
					
					El presidente nicaraguense expreso profundo agradecimiento por el respecto y encomendo a Choe que trasladara su sincero saludo a Su Excelencia Kim Jong Un. 
					
					Diciendo que el envio del enviado especial de Su Excelencia Kim Jong Un a la ceremonia de investidura es una muestra de solidaridad con Nicaragua, afirmo la invariable posicion del gobierno y pueblo nicaraguenses de apreciar y continuar desarrollando las historicas relaciones de amistad entre los dos paises. 
					
					Deseo que bajo la orientacion de Su Excelencia Kim Jong Un, se logren siempre victorias en la lucha del pueblo coreano por la prosperidad del pais.

articles.title: Choe Ryong Hae se reune con Presidentes de Venezuela y Bolivia y primer vicepresidente de CE de Cuba
articles.content:
Choe Ryong Hae se reune con Presidentes de Venezuela y Bolivia y primer vicepresidente de CE de Cuba
Pyongyang, 14 de enero (ACNC) -- El vicepresidente del Comite de Estado de la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea, Choe Ryong Hae, quien es el enviado especial del Maximo Dirigente Kim Jong Un, Presidente del Comite de Estado de la RPDC, se reunio el dia 10 por separado con el Presidente de la Republica Bolivariana de Venezuela, el Presidente del Estado Plurinacional de Bolivia y el primer vicepresidente del Consejo de Estado de la Republica de Cuba, quienes toman parte en ceremonia de toma de posesion del Presidente de la Republica de Nicaragua. 
					Choe Ryong Hae transmitio el saludo de Kim Jong Un al Presidente venezolano Nicolas Maduro Moros, al Presidente boliviano Evo Morales Aima y al Presidente del Consejo de Estado de Cuba Raul Castro Ruz. 
					
					Los mandatarios de Venezuela y Bolivia y el primer vicepresidente del Consejo de Estado de Cuba expresaron profundos agradecimientos y encomendaron a Choe transmitir al Maximo Dirigente Kim Jong Un el sincero saludo de si mismos y de Raul Castro Ruz. 
					
					Nicolas Maduro Moros dijo que Venezuela marchara vigorosamente por el camino socialista rechazando con la fuerza unida las cada dia mas abiertas maniobras de EE.UU. y estara siempre al lado de Corea en la lucha antiimperialista y por el socialismo. 
					
					Evo Morales Aima expreso la admiracion a la lucha del partido, el gobierno y el pueblo coreanos que hacen frente rotundo a los imperialistas y subrayo que su pais superara las dificultades uniendose con los pueblos progresistas del mundo. 
					
					Miguel Mario Diaz Canel Bermudez, primer vicepresidente del Consejo de Estado de la Republica de Cuba, afirmo que las inquebrantables relaciones de amistad preparadas por los lideres antecesores de los dos paises se consolidaran y se desarrollaran para siempre como verdaderos vinculos camaraderiles y deseo que en el ano nuevo tambien el estimado companero Kim Jong Un tenga buena salud y logre mayores exitos en su trabajo responsable de conducir la lucha del pueblo coreano por la prosperidad del pais.

articles.title: Enviado especial de Kim Jong Un parte de Managua
articles.content:
Enviado especial de Kim Jong Un parte de Managua
Pyongyang, 14 de enero (ACNC) -- El vicepresidente del Comite de Estado de la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea, Choe Ryong Hae, quien es el enviado especial del Maximo Dirigente Kim Jong Un, Presidente del Comite de Estado de la RPDC, partio el dia 12 de Managua tras tomar parte en la toma de posesion de Presidente de la Republica de Nicaragua. 
					En el aeropuerto el enviado especial fue despedido por el director de Protocolo de la Presidencia de la Republica de Nicaragua y el embajador nicaraguense en Cuba. 
					
					Durante su permanencia, Choe Ryong Hae recorrio Managua y Granada.

articles.title: Choe Ryong Hae se reune con el vicepresidente de Consejo de Estado de Cuba
articles.content:
Choe Ryong Hae se reune con el vicepresidente de Consejo de Estado de Cuba
Pyongyang, 14 de enero (ACNC) -- El vicepresidente del Comite de Estado de la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea, Choe Ryong Hae, quien habia participado en la toma de posesion del Presidente de la Republica de Nicaragua en calidad de enviado especial del Maximo Dirigente Kim Jong Un, Presidente del CE de la RPDC, se reunio el dia 12 en la sede del Consejo de Estado con el vicepresidente del Consejo de Estado de la Republica de Cuba, Salvador Antonio Valdes Mesa, cuando hizo escala en el pais caribeno en el trayecto de regreso a la patria.
					 Choe Ryong Hae dijo que con el gran orgullo de haber elegido a Kim Jong Un como Presidente del Partido del Trabajo de Corea, el ejercito y el pueblo de Corea logran exitos en la ofensiva general para materializar la resolucion del VII Congreso del Partido.
					
					 Expreso la posicion del PTC y el gobierno de la RPDC de consolidar y desarrollar invariablemente las relaciones bilaterales con Cuba.
					
					  Salvador Antonio apunto que el companero Kim Jong Un quien conduce sabiamente la lucha del pueblo coreano por construir una potencia socialista continuando perfectamente la causa de los grandes Lideres con su extraordinaria capacidad de guia.
					
					  El hecho de que el companero Kim Jong Un expuso las condolencias en la embajada cubana en Corea y envio a Cuba la delegacion del Partido y el Estado cuando fallecio el companero Fidel Castro Ruz, lo cual deviene una expresion de su obligacion moral revolucionaria, recalco.
					
					  Dijo que Cuba rechaza resueltamente todas las "resoluciones" anti-RPDC que inventan las fuerzas hostiles en los escenarios de la ONU y afirmo el poyo a la lucha del pueblo coreano por la reunificacion de la patria.
